title: Games won't load
body: Just went through the patch on 6.15 and now when the champ select is finished and the game goes to load, it crashes and i get a bugsplat report

replies.body: I right clicked the .exe and sleected properties, compatability tab, swapped to windows 8 then back to windows 7 mode, works now

Bugsplat crashes are often caused by issues with Drivers or the League installation. There are a number of specific causes, but our [bugsplat/crashing guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) goes over the most common solutions.

If you still see issues after working through that guide, please inform me.
Comfirmed same issue, bugsplat instead of load.
